name: Iraq War io (opoly)
description:
Iraq War io is a property trading board game. The Iraq War, dubbed Operation Iraqi Freedom, lasted from March 2003 – May 2003. It re-engaged the vast majority of the world's nations—including all of the great powers—eventually forming two opposing military alliances: the Coalition Forces and the Iraqi Military. Collect and trade Palaces, Generals, Leaders, and other properties while you play a strategic property-based Gulf War game.

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
